field.name: ma_kho
field.check: ma_kho not in (select ma_kho from dmkho)⩓ma_kho not in (select ma_kho from kkycct where stt_rec = @stt_rec)

field.name: ma_vi_tri
field.check: @@table.ma_vi_tri <> '' and not exists(select 1 from dmvitri b where b.ma_vi_tri = @@table.ma_vi_tri and b.ma_kho = @@table.ma_kho)

field.name: ma_vt
field.check: ma_vt not in (select ma_vt from dmvt)

field.name: ma_lo
field.check: @@table.ma_lo <> '' and not exists(select 1 from dmlo b where b.ma_vt = @@table.ma_vt and b.ma_lo = @@table.ma_lo)

processing.text:
declare @q nvarchar(4000), @fields nvarchar(4000), @field varchar(32), @user int, @admin bit, @r int, @y int, @d smalldatetime, @qRound tinyint select @qRound = cast(val as tinyint) from options where lower(name) = 'm_round_sl' select @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID select @fields = 'stt_rec, ngay_ct, ma_kho, ma_vi_tri, ma_lo, ma_vt, dvt, so_luong, so_luong1, so_luong2, so_luong3, ghi_chu, datetime0, datetime2, user_id0, user_id2' select @d = ngay_ct from kkyc where stt_rec = @stt_rec select @y = year(max(value)) from (select @d as value union all select ngay_gh1 from dmstt) a
-- Check select @field = 'ma_kho' if @admin = 0 begin if @type = '1' begin if @@sysDatabaseName.dbo.AI_ERP$System$GetAuthorize(@admin, @user, 'PhysicalCountQtyUpdate', 'Edit') = 0 select @type = '0' end -- if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select @field, stt, '00002' from @@table a where not exists(select 1 from dmkho c where a.ma_kho = c.ma_kho and c.ma_dvcs in (select distinct ma_dvcs from sysunitrights where user_id = @user and r_new = 1)) &w1;@field&w2;stt&w3;'00002'&w4; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(stt) from @@table a where not exists(select 1 from dmkho c where a.ma_kho = c.ma_kho and c.ma_dvcs in (select distinct ma_dvcs from sysunitrights where user_id = @user and r_new = 1))&Error; end &SiteRight; end
&Checking;
-- Update update @@table set dvt = case when a.dvt <> '' then a.dvt else b.dvt end from @@table a left join dmvt b on a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt select @field = 'dvt' if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select @field, stt, '00002' from @@table a left join vdmvtqddvt b on a.dvt = b.dvt and (a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt or b.ma_vt = '*') left join dmvt c on a.ma_vt = c.ma_vt and a.dvt = c.dvt where b.dvt is null and c.dvt is null &w1;@field&w2;stt&w3;'00002'&w4; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(stt) from @@table a left join vdmvtqddvt b on a.dvt = b.dvt and (a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt or b.ma_vt = '*') left join dmvt c on a.ma_vt = c.ma_vt and a.dvt = c.dvt where b.dvt is null and c.dvt is null&Error; end
&EndErrorMode;
-- Gather select top 0 a.stt_rec, a.ngay_ct, a.ma_kho, a.ma_vi_tri, a.ma_lo, a.ma_vt, a.dvt, a.so_luong1, a.so_luong2, a.so_luong3, a.so_luong, a.he_so, b.nhieu_dvt, a.sl_qd, a.sl_qd1, a.sl_qd2, a.sl_qd3, a.ghi_chu into #r from kktt$0000 a, dmvt b
insert into #r select @stt_rec, @d, a.ma_kho, a.ma_vi_tri, a.ma_lo, a.ma_vt, a.dvt, a.so_luong1, a.so_luong2, a.so_luong3, a.so_luong, 1 as he_so, b.nhieu_dvt, 0, 0, 0, 0, a.ghi_chu from @@table a left join dmvt b on a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt update #r set he_so = b.he_so from #r a join vdmvtqddvt b on (a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt or b.ma_vt = '*') and a.dvt = b.dvt where a.nhieu_dvt = 1 update #r set sl_qd = round((so_luong * he_so), @qRound), sl_qd1 = round((so_luong1 * he_so), @qRound), sl_qd2 = round((so_luong2 * he_so), @qRound), sl_qd3 = round((so_luong3 * he_so), @qRound) select top 0 * into #k from #r
-- Delete if @type = '0' begin select @q = 'delete #r from #r a where exists(select 1 from kktt$' + rtrim(@y) + ' b where a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ma_kho = b.ma_kho and a.ma_vi_tri = b.ma_vi_tri and a.ma_lo = b.ma_lo and a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt and a.dvt = b.dvt)' exec sp_executesql @q end select @q = 'insert into #k select a.stt_rec, a.ngay_ct, a.ma_kho, a.ma_vi_tri, a.ma_lo, a.ma_vt, a.dvt, a.so_luong1, a.so_luong2, a.so_luong3, a.so_luong, a.he_so, a.nhieu_dvt, a.sl_qd, a.sl_qd1, a.sl_qd2, a.sl_qd3, a.ghi_chu from #r a join kktt$' + rtrim(@y) + ' b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ma_kho = b.ma_kho and a.ma_vi_tri = b.ma_vi_tri and a.ma_lo = b.ma_lo and a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt and a.dvt = b.dvt' exec sp_executesql @q delete #r from #r a where exists(select 1 from #k b where a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ma_kho = b.ma_kho and a.ma_vi_tri = b.ma_vi_tri and a.ma_lo = b.ma_lo and a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt and a.dvt = b.dvt)
-- Insert select @q = 'insert into kktt$' + rtrim(@y) + ' (@@sources, @@denyFields' + case when '@@remainFields' <> '' then ',' else '' + '@@remainFields' end + ') select @@fields, stt_rec, ngay_ct, he_so, sl_qd, sl_qd1, sl_qd2, sl_qd3' + case when '@@remainFields' <> '' then ',' else '' + '@@remainFields' end + ' from #r' exec sp_executesql @q
-- Update if @type = '1' begin select @q = 'update kktt$' + rtrim(@y) + ' set @@list, sl_qd = b.sl_qd, sl_qd1 = b.sl_qd1, sl_qd2 = b.sl_qd2, sl_qd3 = b.sl_qd3' select @q = @q + ' from kktt$' + rtrim(@y) + ' a join #k b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ma_kho = b.ma_kho and a.ma_vi_tri = b.ma_vi_tri and a.ma_lo = b.ma_lo and a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt and a.dvt = b.dvt' exec sp_executesql @q end
